snippet: Supporters of the former Yemeni president, Ali Abdullah Saleh, accused the United States ambassador to Yemen of demanding that Mr. Saleh leave the country.
abstract: Obama administration denies that it is interfering in Yemen’s escalating civil conflict after supporters of former Yemeni President Ali Abdullah Saleh accuse Matthew H Tueller, United States ambassador to Yemen, of demanding that Saleh leave the country.

byline.contributor: Shuaib Almosawa contributed reporting from Al-Udain, Yemen, and Somini Sengupta from the United Nations.

lead_paragraph: Supporters of the former Yemeni president, Ali Abdullah Saleh, accused the United States ambassador to Yemen of demanding that Mr. Saleh leave the country.

headline.main: Washington Denies a Role in Yemeni Unrest
headline.print_headline: Washington Denies a Role in Yemeni Unrest
